description: This file contains utility functions for SNMP operations, including retrieving model number, firmware version, and MAC address from an embedded device, as well as setting environment variables for SNMP queries.

methods.name: setSNMPEnv
methods.description: Configures environment variables necessary for SNMP client commands, including MIBs paths and library paths.

methods.name: getModel
methods.description: Retrieves the device model number from '/etc/device.properties'.

methods.name: getFirmwareVersion
methods.description: Uses snmpget to retrieve the firmware version from the device's sysDescr.0 OID.

methods.name: getECMMac
methods.description: Performs SNMP walk to obtain the MAC address of the device's second network interface.
